com.tweetcrawl.agents.utils

Class BBPetterson

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tweetcrawl.agents.utils.BBPetterson
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BBPetterson
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class used as a mutual exclusion for Processor agents. The instance should be created by the Launcher agent.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getRequest

        public boolean getRequest(int id)
        Allows to get a Processor agent current request state.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Processor agent
        Returns:
        true if the Processor agent is currently requesting the access, false otherwise

      • setRequest

        public void setRequest(int id,
                       boolean value)
        Allows to define a Processor agent current request state.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Processor agent
        value - true if the Processor agent wants to request the access, false if he wants to remove it

      • getNbRequests

        public int getNbRequests()
        Allows to get the total request number possible as the number of concurrent Processor agents.
        Returns:
        the total request number possible
